name: SpiderSolitaire BLACK
description:
Classic Solo play card game "Spider Solitaire" has been arranged in cool style!

300 stages in Stage mode, and also Random mode is playable!

At Random mode, Your play recode such as time and clear rate will be recorded in details per difficulty levels.

At Stage mode, 300 stages in different difficulty levels are available.

Let's challenge Hard mode if you naver try!

Resume is possible during the game that takes time.

You can play whenever wherever continually.

Let's challenge to clear the Hard stage game as well!
